items.sentence: It wasn\'t just Tom who saw Mary do what she said she didn\'t do.
It was still early in the day when Tom arrived at the campground.
Tom doesn\'t mind devoting a lot of time to helping the homeless.
I want a written report in my hands first thing tomorrow morning.
Tom knows it\'s only a matter of time until the police catch him.
Tom looked out the window and saw Mary\'s car in the parking lot.
He left home early in the morning so he wouldn\'t miss the train.
How long do you think it\'ll take until the pain is totally gone?
How long do you think you\'ll need to finish writing this report?
How many times do I have to tell you that I don\'t want you here?
